隒字的基本解释

隒
yǎn
层叠的山崖：“夫守者不失其隒者也。”
旁边，山边。

隒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》魚檢切，上琰，疑。］
(1)层叠的山崖。
(2)崖岸。

隒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隒； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1358第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】魚檢切【韻會】疑檢切，?音噞。【說文】厓也。【爾雅·釋山】重甗隒。【註】山形如累兩甗。甗，甑也。山形狀似之，因以名云。【疏】孫炎云：崖有重岸也。又【釋畜疏】善陞甗者，登山隒也。【詩·王風·在河之漘傳】漘，水隒也。【疏】隒是山岸，漘是水岸，故云水隒。【郭璞·江賦】厓隒爲之泐嵃，碕嶺爲之嵒崿。　又【玉篇】方也。　又【集韻】丘檢切，音嵰。又力冉切，音斂。義?同。

隒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
隒字的起名意思

暂无。

Plutonium
Basic explanation of words
Plutonium
yǎn
The cascading cliffs: "The guardian of the husband does not lose his pluton."
Next to the mountain.
Plutonium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" fish inspection, Shangyan, suspicious. ]
(1) Stacked cliffs.
(2) Cliff bank.
Plutonium
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Collection】【Fu Character Department】　隒; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1358 No. 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Fish inspection and cutting [Yunhui] Suspicious inspection and cutting,? Sound 噞. [Said the text] Ya also. 【Erya·Shishan】Chongqiu. [Note] The shape of the mountain is as tired as two burles. Zeng, Zeng also. The shape of the mountain resembles it, because of its name. [Sparse] Sun Yanyun: Cliffs have heavy shores. Also 【Release of Animals】Seniors who are good at raising 甗, climbers are also. 【Poetry·Wang Feng·Zaihezhizhuan】Cao, Shuijing also. 【Sparse】Pluton is a mountain bank, and Jiao is a water bank, so cloud water plutonium. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Ya Ku is the origin of Luang, and Peiling is the origin of Yankong.　[Jade articles] Fang Ye.　[Jiyun] Qiu check and cut, sound 嵰. Ran cut again, the sound converged. Righteous? Same.
